title: Popsicle
description: Popsicle is an easy-as-pie framework for creating and managing interpolations of different value types, as well as implementing your own custom value interpolations.

title: Bohr
description: Bohr is a framework that allows to set up a settings screen for your app with three principles in mind: ease, customization and extensibility.

title: DRCellSlideGestureRecognizer
description: DRCellSlideGestureRecognizer is a library that allows developers to make cells actionable through swipes, a l√† Mailbox.

title: DRPageScrollView
description: DRPageScrollView is an iOS library that wraps around UIScrollView in order to make paginated scroll views using a block-based approach.
